name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Why do many people now prefer to report online with their real names rather than calling the police directly? 
Netizen’s reply: Because the police chief himself posted on the Internet asking for help.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
July 27, near the Tang Dynasty City in Xi'an, Shaanxi.
A man holding a kitchen knife challenged a group of special police and armed police, but was later subdued by the police.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/zcbWaPwz5c

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: At the opening ceremony of the Paris Olympics, athletes from various countries entered the venue by boat from the Seine River. Because the Chinese team was ranked 41st and shared a boat with Canada and other countries, domestic netizens were upset. Netizens believed that even if they shared a boat, they should share a boat with the Hong Kong and Taiwan teams.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On July 27, Zhangjiakou, Hebei. An appendage of a building along the street in Sandagou, Shacheng Town, fell down, and a pedestrian was injured and screamed at the top of his lungs.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: July 28 (Released) Suzhou, Jiangsu. Ma Xiangyu, a staff member of the Suzhou Industrial Park Commerce Bureau, released a video, reporting by real name that the director of the Commerce Bureau violated bidding rules and colluded with others in government procurement, and set up fictitious projects to siphon funds. After reporting to the Commission for Discipline Inspection and Supervision, there was no response, and he was also threatened by the director.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On July 28, Hengyang, Hunan. A landslide occurred in Nanyue District. According to reports, as of 12:10, 18 people had been rescued, including 12 deaths and 6 injuries.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
Because the demolition policy is too bad and the resettlement compensation is too low, the villagers are unwilling to move, and the deputy secretary-general of the Danzhou Municipal Government led the urban management to forcibly demolish the villagers' houses.
At 13:00 on the afternoon of May 24, the deputy secretary-general of the Danzhou Municipal Government and the deputy mayor of Paipu Town forcibly dragged and drove out the whole family of villager Wang Yufeng from the house without any legal procedures, and then violently demolished the house of Wang Yufeng's only residence.
During this forced demolition process, they used rough means, sprayed pepper water on Wang Yufeng's mother, dragged Wang Yufeng's mother, and even hit her eyes, causing her injury.
On May 28, the deputy secretary-general of the Danzhou Municipal Government and the party secretary of the Paipu Town Government once again led a large number of people to forcibly drive Wang Yuzhen's family out of the house without any legal procedures, and illegally and violently demolished the only building where Wang Yuzhen lived.
Now, the family of villager Wang Yufeng is homeless and displaced.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
According to a report on July 26, a man was unable to transfer his hospital bills due to a bank card limit, so the police urgently collected 24,000 yuan in "WeChat balance" to help transfer the money. 
Netizens responded, "This is not worth praising at all" and "How ridiculous, sad and shameful"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On July 24, a blogger launched a poll on Toutiao, asking "Who cares about the happy lives of Chinese people?" As a result, 2,340 people voted for "the U.S. government" and "the Chinese government" only received 251 votes.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, a disabled veteran of the Second Artillery Corps of the People's Liberation Army reported to the Central Inspection Team under his real name, saying that the deputy secretary of the Tangshan Municipal Commission for Discipline Inspection condoned and shielded her husband, the director of Fengnan District Hospital, who killed her father and robbed him of his property. For this reason, he reported to the Central Inspection Team four times through the special telephone number and 30 times through the special QR code of the Central Inspection Team, but to no avail.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: According to the National Bureau of Statistics on July 27, from January to June, the manufacturing industry achieved a total profit of 2,498.51 billion yuan, an increase of 5.0%; the electricity, heat, gas and water production and supply industry achieved a total profit of 396.88 billion yuan, an increase of 23.1%

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: July 26, Liaoning. A man drove a bulldozer to rescue a policeman trapped in the water. As a result, netizens left messages asking the man not to rescue him.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: July 23, Harbin, Heilongjiang. Two cosplayers were beaten by an old man with a stick at a subway station. The parties involved and people familiar with the situation said, "After we called the police, the old man ran away and the police asked us to drop the case."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, the Ordos Procuratorate sent a "Notice of Correction of Illegal Acts" to the Baotou Public Security Bureau, stating that the Baotou Public Security Bureau had committed seven illegal acts in the process of handling cases. These included failure to make simultaneous audio and video recordings, recording transcripts in advance and then recording them simultaneously, instructive and inductive interrogations, and other acts of inducing confessions, and interrogations lasting for a long time, or continuing interrogations when the defendant was unwell.
A lawyer said, "Any one of these seven items is very powerful. If all of them are used, there is no confession that cannot be obtained. I guess no one can withstand it."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Is there a food safety risk in Shanghaojia, which has been eaten by three generations? Recently, an employee in Shanghai reported that Shanghaojia used about 25 tons of expired packaging paper to pack food for sale. The employee has been fired by Shanghaojia.
Shanghai Qingpu District Market Supervision and Administration Bureau: The situation is true.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, the Beijing Railway Public Security Bureau has issued inquiries and warnings to train fans in Tangshan and Qinhuangdao, and at the same time conducted a survey of employees, prohibiting train fans from going to some railway lines to take photos.
It is suspected that this is related to the fact that some special trains for the Beidaihe Conference were photographed and uploaded many times by train fans.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: As of 19:28, the on-site rescue work was completed and a total of 21 people were rescued, of which 15 were killed and 6 were injured.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
July 28 (Release), Tiananmen Square, Beijing.
A man squatted in a flower bed and took off his underwear, and there was a police car not far away from him.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: July 28, Jilin. Several bulldozers shoveling water on the street caused confusion among netizens.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/7UyAu6rlQu

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: July 26, Qingdao, Shandong. A man with a knife confronted the police on Yangzhou Road and was subdued by the police.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the afternoon of July 28, on the streets of Xi'an, a car had a message on its rear window: "After 40 years of reform, we are back to the days before liberation!"
